attributes.action: Make St George’s day a bank holiday
attributes.additional_details:
Create or move an existing bank holiday to the Monday following St George’s service on the Sunday. 

Giving a day of celebration.
attributes.background: Make St George’s day a bank holiday Monday after the Sunday service for St George

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654089
